title: Shrubs and Grasses
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. The land is gently sloped up to the north, gently sloped up to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
